channel.title: Technology Detection on ZAP
channel.description: Recent content in Technology Detection on ZAP

item.title: Technology Detection API
item.description: Technology Detection API The following views are available via the API: Views listSites: Lists all the sites recognized by the Technology Detection add-on. listAll: Lists all sites and their associated applications (technologies). listSite (site*): Lists all the applications (technologies) associated with the specified site. See also Wappalyzer

item.title: Options Tech Detection screen
item.description: Options Tech Detection screen This screen allows you to configure the Tech Detection options: Mode The Mode which controls the behavior of the technology detection passive scan rule. This Mode is persisted between ZAP sessions. Quick > Return on first match; which may mean missing version information, but should be slightly more performant.
